message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. Given its worth, I'm initially proposing a price of $14,000. I'm open to discussing this further if you have any thoughts.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm willing to pay a maximum of $12,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. While $12,000 is a bit lower than I hoped for, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
